title: cmd/go: make -fooprofile flags imply -c
body:
Running go test -cpuprofile is kind of useless, because there is no binary for pprof to
analyze.
Running go test -c and then the test binary is annoying because you have to put 'test.'
on all your flags.
Let's make go test -cpuprofile or -memprofile or -blockprofile imply -c.
